name: 王永順
objective: The main focus of this course is to introduce variety of opportunities for student to learn and to experience different types of sport,  the sport including table tennis, Martial Art, basketball, track and field, and fitness, each of course is about 5 week or shorter.
schedule:
Each of sport item is designed with five-week base:

Table-tennis: 1w~5w
Martial Art: 7w~12w
Basketball: 14w~18w

*note that week 6 and week 13 are fitness measurement.
scorePolicy:
the grades are evaluate in three domains:

Cognitive aspect: be able to illustrate skill verbally
Affective aspect:learning spiritual of game from interaction with peers.
Skill aspect: be able to demonstrate certain skill systematically and correctly.

Mid-term: 40%
end-term:40%
attendance rate: 20%
